about_the_game: This is the soundtrack for the indie audiogame "Rocococo Audiogame Fantastique" created by Kasson Crooker.  This soundtrack is music composed by Rocococo and used in throughout the audiogame. Enjoy the Baroque Eleqtronique Musique!
detailed_description: This is the soundtrack for the indie audiogame "Rocococo Audiogame Fantastique" created by Kasson Crooker.  This soundtrack is music composed by Rocococo and used in throughout the audiogame. Enjoy the Baroque Eleqtronique Musique!
